items.name: Activity Overview
items.value: count() by _path | sort -r
items.description: Shows a list of all Zeek streams in the data set, with a count of associated records

items.name: Unique DNS Queries
items.value: _path=="dns" | count() by query | sort -r
items.description: Shows all unique DNS queries in the data set with count

items.name: Top Domains
items.value: _path=="dns" | count() by domain:=join(split(query,".")[-2:],".") | sort -r
items.description: Displays the domains appearing most frequently in DNS queries

items.name: Windows Networking Activity
items.value: grep(smb*,_path) OR _path=="dce_rpc"
items.description: Filters and displays smb_files, smb_mapping and DCE_RPC activity

items.name: HTTP Requests
items.value: _path=="http" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, method, host, uri | uniq -c
items.description: Displays a list of the count of unique HTTP requests including source and destination

items.name: Unique Network Connections
items.value: _path=="conn" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_p, id.resp_h | sort | uniq
items.description: Displays a table showing all unique source:port:destination connections pairings

items.name: Connection Received Data
items.value: _path=="conn" | put total_bytes := orig_bytes + resp_bytes | sort -r total_bytes | cut uid, id, orig_bytes, resp_bytes, total_bytes
items.description: Shows the connections between hosts, sorted by data received

items.name: File Activity
items.value: filename!=null | cut _path, tx_hosts, rx_hosts, conn_uids, mime_type, filename, md5, sha1
items.description: Displays a curated view of file data including md5 and sha1 for complete file transfers

items.name: Identify File Downloads from External Sources
items.value: _path=="files" AND tx_hosts!=rx_hosts | cut orig_fuid, orig_mime_type, orig_filename, orig_bytes, tx_hosts | sort -r orig_bytes
items.description: Detects file downloads where the source and destination hosts are different

items.name: HTTP Post Requests
items.value: method=="POST" | cut ts, uid, id, method, uri, status_code
items.description: Displays all HTTP Post requests including the URI and HTTP status code

items.name: Show IP Subnets
items.value: _path=="conn" | put classnet := network_of(id.resp_h) | cut classnet | count() by classnet | sort -r
items.description: Enumerates the classful networks for all destination IP addresses including count of connections

items.name: Top Talkers
items.value: _path=="conn" | count() by id.orig_h | sort -r
items.description: Shows the top IP addresses initiating the most connections

items.name: Top Services by Port
items.value: _path=="conn" | count() by id.resp_p | sort -r
items.description: Displays the most commonly used destination ports

items.name: Suspicious DNS Queries
items.value: _path=="dns" | filter query =~ /.*[^a-zA-Z0-9\.-].*/ | count() by query | sort -r
items.description: Identifies DNS queries with suspicious characters

items.name: Top HTTP User-Agents
items.value: _path=="http" | count() by user_agent | sort -r
items.description: Shows the most common User-Agent strings in HTTP requests

items.name: Failed Connection Attempts
items.value: _path=="conn" AND conn_state=="S0" | count() by id.orig_h, id.resp_h | sort -r
items.description: Displays all failed connection attempts

items.name: HTTP Requests by Status Code
items.value: _path=="http" | count() by status_code | sort -r
items.description: Shows the number of HTTP requests grouped by status code

items.name: Large Data Transfers
items.value: _path=="conn" | filter orig_bytes + resp_bytes > 10485760 | sort -r (orig_bytes + resp_bytes)
items.description: Identifies network connections with data transfers greater than 10MB

items.name: Top HTTP Methods
items.value: _path=="http" | count() by method | sort -r
items.description: Shows the most commonly used HTTP methods

items.name: Unique TLS Connections
items.value: _path=="ssl" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p | uniq
items.description: Displays all unique TLS connections

items.name: DNS Queries by Response Code
items.value: _path=="dns" | count() by rcode | sort -r
items.description: Counts DNS queries grouped by response code

items.name: Top Destination IPs
items.value: _path=="conn" | count() by id.resp_h | sort -r
items.description: Shows the IP addresses receiving the most connections

items.name: Connections by Duration
items.value: _path=="conn" | put duration := ts - orig_ts | sort -r duration | cut uid, id, duration
items.description: Displays connections sorted by their duration

items.name: Unusual Protocols
items.value: _path=="conn" | count() by proto | sort -r | filter proto not in ("tcp", "udp", "icmp")
items.description: Identifies network traffic using less common protocols

items.name: TLS Certificates
items.value: _path=="ssl" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_h, id.resp_p, subject, issuer, valid_from, valid_until | uniq
items.description: Shows details of TLS certificates observed in the network

items.name: Outbound Traffic
items.value: _path=="conn" | cut id.orig_h, id.resp_h | uniq | sort id.orig_h
items.description: Lists unique outbound connections from internal hosts

items.name: Uncommon HTTP Methods
items.value: _path=="http" | count() by method | sort -r
items.description: Shows less common HTTP methods used in HTTP requests

items.name: Database Connection Attempts
items.value: _path=="conn" AND id.resp_p in (3306, 5432, 1433) | count() by id.orig_h, id.resp_p | sort -r
items.description: Identifies attempts to connect to common database ports (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MSSQL)

items.name: Unauthorized Port Scans
items.value: _path=="conn" AND conn_state=="S0" | count() by id.orig_h | sort -r
items.description: Detects hosts initiating port scans (SYN scans)

items.name: HTTP Requests with Suspicious URI Patterns
items.value: _path=="http" | filter uri =~ /.*(cmd|shell|phpmyadmin|admin|config).*/ | count() by uri | sort -r
items.description: Identifies HTTP requests with suspicious URI patterns indicative of possible attacks
